Witch Kalis: You foolish man who does not fear death! Now, receive my test! Do you really think that you have anybody among your clan members who is willing to sacrifice their life for you? [Quest Q00501_ProofOfClanAlliance 30759-03.htm|Tell her that you have someone.] [Quest Q00501_ProofOfClanAlliance 30759-04.htm|Tell her that you have nobody.]
